item.title: [PI] Spawning
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]You won’t learn much sticking to RSPS.

^.^[/quote]
Meh. Coding maybe. Modeling you can learn everything besides making hi poly models. You can learn about animation. And how to make some from rsps. Just not bone animation. Enough off-topic. lulz. What did I do wrong anyways.

[quote=“Sir Jay, post:11, topic:373025”]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gtQJXzi3Yns&feature=channel
Watch his series, brillant.[/quote]
Good god he has like 100 lessons. Thanks by the way.

item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Lol wanderer.

Stick to models. :P[/quote]
I’m trying to go away from camping in the models section. Trying to expand my knowledge of coding. Learned almost everything there is about modeling rsps wise. May try to take Mr. P’s spot and start developing on his datMaker. But I need to learn how to code first. hurhur.

item.title: [PI] Spawning
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup") && c.playerRights > 0) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); int[] noSpawn = {13899,13893,13905,13887,13858,13861,13864,13867,13884,13890,13896,13902,13870,13873,13876,13879,13883,14484,11283}; for(element : noSpawn) { if(condition == element) { c.sendMessage("You may not spawn this item."); return; } } if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp"); } }
Farxed?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Spawning
item.dc:creator: @pbscape pbscape
item.description:
@pbscape wrote:

Hello, I’m trying to make it so you can’t spawn certain items but now it won’t even let you spawn help?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup") && c.playerRights > 0) {
        String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
        if (args.length == 3) {
            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
            int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
            for(int element : noSpawn) {
                if(element == newItemID) {
                    c.sendMessage("You may not spawn this item.");
                    return;
                }
            }
            if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
                c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                c.sendMessage("No such item.");
            }
        } else {
            c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp");
        }
}

Read full topic
